attributes.action: dissolve Parliament and hold a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since taking over as Prime Minister in a one horse race within his party the Prime Minister has continually faced criticism that he has no mandate for rule. Recent events have shown the Prime Minister to be a weak leader of Government and the country urgently needs a stronger Prime Minister to lead it through the current and impending economic situation. This Government is clearly unable to lead effectively.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
